metadata.Title: CVE-2016-6190 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: SOGo before 2.3.12 and 3.x before 3.1.1 does not restrict access to the UIDand DTSTAMP attributes, which allows remote authenticated users to obtainsensitive information about appointments with the "View the Date & Time"restriction, as demonstrated by correlating UIDs and DTSTAMPs between allusers.

criterions.comment: sogo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
